Uncompressed file is almost 15 Go !!! How can I install it on my gps hdd ? Can I delete some files ? Can u help me plz qweluk ?

unlock the MMCS' hdd as described here: http://www.mitsubishiforum.com/forum/showthread.php?t=25583

then extract all files to the MMCS' disk partition containing the maps (overwrite)
